sourcesContent:
export const mockData = {
  hero: {
    headline: "From SEO to AIVO – Be Visible Where AI Looks.",
    subheadline: "Optimize your brand for AI-driven search, assistants, and voice.",
    primaryCTA: "Boost AI Visibility",
    secondaryCTA: "Start Free Trial"
  },
  
  workflow: {
    title: "How AIVO Works",
    subtitle: "Transform your SEO strategy in 4 simple steps",
    steps: [
      {
        id: 1,
        title: "Discover Prompts",
        description: "Find out what real users ask AI agents about your industry.",
        icon: "Search",
        stats: "10K+ prompts analyzed daily"
      },
      {
        id: 2,
        title: "Track AI Mentions",
        description: "See if ChatGPT, Gemini, or Copilot mention your brand—or your competitors.",
        icon: "Eye",
        stats: "Real-time monitoring across 5+ AI platforms"
      },
      {
        id: 3,
        title: "Analyze Trust Sources",
        description: "Identify which websites and data sources AI models pull from.",
        icon: "Shield",
        stats: "500M+ data sources tracked"
      },
      {
        id: 4,
        title: "Generate AI-Optimized Content",
        description: "Create content designed to rank inside AI-driven answers.",
        icon: "Zap",
        stats: "3x higher AI visibility rate"
      }
    ]
  },
  
  features: [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: "AI Visibility Tracker",
      description: "Monitor how often and where your brand appears in AI answers across multiple platforms.",
      icon: "TrendingUp",
      metrics: ["Real-time tracking", "Cross-platform coverage", "Historical data"]
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: "Competitor Benchmarking",
      description: "See who AI recommends—and why. Understand your competitive landscape in AI search.",
      icon: "Users",
      metrics: ["Competitor analysis", "Market share insights", "Recommendation patterns"]
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: "Smart Content Generator",
      description: "Get AI-first content ideas tailored to your niche and optimized for AI visibility.",
      icon: "PenTool",
      metrics: ["AI-optimized content", "Industry-specific", "SEO + AIVO ready"]
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      title: "Prompt Intelligence",
      description: "Track real AI queries your audience is asking to stay ahead of search trends.",
      icon: "Brain",
      metrics: ["Query analysis", "Trend forecasting", "User intent mapping"]
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      title: "Multi-Platform Coverage",
      description: "Works across ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity, Copilot & more emerging AI platforms.",
      icon: "Globe",
      metrics: ["5+ AI platforms", "Growing coverage", "Future-proof"]
    },
    {
      id: 6,
      title: "Trust Source Analysis",
      description: "Identify and optimize the authoritative sources that AI models trust and reference.",
      icon: "Award",
      metrics: ["Authority mapping", "Source optimization", "Trust scoring"]
    }
  ],
  
  testimonials: [
    {
      id: 1,
      quote: "AIVO gave us clarity on how AI agents perceive our brand—total game-changer.",
      author: "Sarah Chen",
      title: "Head of Marketing",
      company: "TechFlow Inc",
      avatar: "SC",
      rating: 5
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      quote: "Finally, a tool that helps optimize for AI instead of just Google.",
      author: "Marcus Rodriguez",
      title: "SEO Director",
      company: "GrowthLab",
      avatar: "MR",
      rating: 5
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      quote: "With AIVO, we boosted our AI visibility in weeks, not months.",
      author: "Emily Watson",
      title: "Content Manager",
      company: "DataScale",
      avatar: "EW",
      rating: 5
    }
  ],
  
  pricing: [
    {
      id: 1,
      name: "Starter",
      price: 49,
      annualPrice: 39,
      description: "Perfect for small businesses getting started with AI visibility",
      features: [
        "Track 50 Prompts",
        "Monitor 1 Website",
        "AI Mentions on ChatGPT",
        "Basic Analytics",
        "Email Support"
      ],
      cta: "Start Free Trial",
      popular: false
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      name: "Growth",
      price: 149,
      annualPrice: 119,
      description: "Ideal for growing companies serious about AI optimization",
      features: [
        "Track 250 Prompts",
        "Monitor 3 Websites",
        "Multi-agent Tracking",
        "Competitor Analysis",
        "Advanced Analytics",
        "Priority Support"
      ],
      cta: "Boost AI Visibility",
      popular: true
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      name: "Enterprise",
      price: 499,
      annualPrice: 399,
      description: "For enterprises requiring comprehensive AI visibility solutions",
      features: [
        "Unlimited Prompts",
        "Unlimited Websites",
        "Competitor Intelligence",
        "Custom Integrations",
        "Dedicated Account Manager",
        "24/7 Phone Support"
      ],
      cta: "Book Demo",
      popular: false
    }
  ],
  
  stats: {
    prompts: "10M+",
    companies: "2,500+",
    platforms: "5+",
    visibility: "300%"
  }
};
